body_html:
according to this link https://www.notebookcheck.net/AMD-Radeon-Pro-WX-4150-GPU.215312.0.html
AMD Radeon Pro WX 4150's architecture is Polaris which is supported by hiptensorflow. for related info and installation see:
https://github.com/ROCmSoftwarePlatform/hiptensorflow/blob/hip/README.ROCm.md

according to this link https://www.notebookcheck.net/AMD-Radeon-Pro-WX-4150-GPU.215312.0.html
